verses.verse: Behold <S%H2005><s%> my servant, <S%H5650><s%> whom I uphold; <S%H8551><s%> mine elect, <S%H972><s%> in whom my soul <S%H5315><s%> delighteth; <S%H7521><s%> I have put <S%H5414><s%> my spirit <S%H7307><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> him: he shall bring forth <S%H3318><s%> judgment <S%H4941><s%> to the Gentiles. <S%H1471><s%>
He shall not <S%H3808><s%> cry, <S%H6817><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> lift up, <S%H5375><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> cause his voice <S%H6963><s%> to be heard <S%H8085><s%> in the street. <S%H2351><s%>

A bruised <S%H7533><s%> reed <S%H7070><s%> shall he not <S%H3808><s%> break, <S%H7665><s%> and the smoking <S%H3544><s%> flax <S%H6594><s%> shall he not <S%H3808><s%> quench: <S%H3518><s%> he shall bring forth <S%H3318><s%> judgment <S%H4941><s%> unto truth. <S%H571><s%>

He shall not <S%H3808><s%> fail <S%H3543><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> be discouraged, <S%H7533><s%> till <S%H5704><s%> he have set <S%H7760><s%> judgment <S%H4941><s%> in the earth: <S%H776><s%> and the isles <S%H339><s%> shall wait <S%H3176><s%> for his law. <S%H8451><s%>

Thus <S%H3541><s%> saith <S%H559><s%> God <S%H410><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> he that created <S%H1254><s%> the heavens, <S%H8064><s%> and stretched them out; <S%H5186><s%> he that spread forth <S%H7554><s%> the earth, <S%H776><s%> and that which cometh out <S%H6631><s%> of it; he that giveth <S%H5414><s%> breath <S%H5397><s%> unto the people <S%H5971><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> it, and spirit <S%H7307><s%> to them that walk <S%H1980><s%> therein:

I <S%H589><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> have called <S%H7121><s%> thee in righteousness, <S%H6664><s%> and will hold <S%H2388><s%> thine hand, <S%H3027><s%> and will keep <S%H5341><s%> thee, and give <S%H5414><s%> thee for a covenant <S%H1285><s%> of the people, <S%H5971><s%> for a light <S%H216><s%> of the Gentiles; <S%H1471><s%>

To open <S%H6491><s%> the blind <S%H5787><s%> eyes, <S%H5869><s%> to bring out <S%H3318><s%> the prisoners <S%H616><s%> from the prison, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4525><s%> and them that sit <S%H3427><s%> in darkness <S%H2822><s%> out of the prison <S%H3608><s%> house. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1004><s%>

I <S%H589><s%> am the LORD: <S%H3068><s%> that <S%H1931><s%> is my name: <S%H8034><s%> and my glory <S%H3519><s%> will I not <S%H3808><s%> give <S%H5414><s%> to another, <S%H312><s%> neither my praise <S%H8416><s%> to graven images. <S%H6456><s%>

Behold, <S%H2009><s%> the former things <S%H7223><s%> are come to pass, <S%H935><s%> and new things <S%H2319><s%> do I <S%H589><s%> declare: <S%H5046><s%> before <S%H2962><s%> they spring forth <S%H6779><s%> I tell <S%H8085><s%> you of them.

Sing <S%H7891><s%> unto the LORD <S%H3068><s%> a new <S%H2319><s%> song, <S%H7892><s%> and his praise <S%H8416><s%> from the end <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7097><s%> of the earth, <S%H776><s%> ye that go down <S%H3381><s%> to the sea, <S%H3220><s%> and all that is therein; <S%H4393><s%> the isles, <S%H339><s%> and the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> thereof.

Let the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> and the cities <S%H5892><s%> thereof lift up <S%H5375><s%> their voice, the villages <S%H2691><s%> that Kedar <S%H6938><s%> doth inhabit: <S%H3427><s%> let the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of the rock <S%H5553><s%> sing, <S%H7442><s%> let them shout <S%H6681><s%> from the top <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7218><s%> of the mountains. <S%H2022><s%>
Let them give <S%H7760><s%> glory <S%H3519><s%> unto the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and declare <S%H5046><s%> his praise <S%H8416><s%> in the islands. <S%H339><s%>

The LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall go forth <S%H3318><s%> as a mighty man, <S%H1368><s%> he shall stir up <S%H5782><s%> jealousy <S%H7068><s%> like a man <S%H376><s%> of war: <S%H4421><s%> he shall cry, <S%H7321><s%> yea, <S%H637><s%> roar; <S%H6873><s%> he shall prevail <S%H1396><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> his enemies. <S%H341><s%>

I have long time <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5769><s%> holden my peace; <S%H2814><s%> I have been still, <S%H2790><s%> and refrained myself: <S%H662><s%> now will I cry <S%H6463><s%> like a travailing woman; <S%H3205><s%> I will destroy <S%H5395><s%> and devour <S%H7602><s%> at once. <S%H3162><s%>

I will make waste <S%H2717><s%> mountains <S%H2022><s%> and hills, <S%H1389><s%> and dry up <S%H3001><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> their herbs; <S%H6212><s%> and I will make <S%H7760><s%> the rivers <S%H5104><s%> islands, <S%H339><s%> and I will dry up <S%H3001><s%> the pools. <S%H98><s%>

And I will bring <S%H1980><s%> the blind <S%H5787><s%> by a way <S%H1870><s%> that they knew <S%H3045><s%> not; <S%H3808><s%> I will lead them <S%H1869><s%> in paths <S%H5410><s%> that they have not <S%H3808><s%> known: <S%H3045><s%> I will make <S%H7760><s%> darkness <S%H4285><s%> light <S%H216><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> them, and crooked things <S%H4625><s%> straight. <S%H4334><s%> These <S%H428><s%> things <S%H1697><s%> will I do <S%H6213><s%> unto them, and not <S%H3808><s%> forsake <S%H5800><s%> them.

They shall be turned <S%H5472><s%> back, <S%H268><s%> they shall be greatly ashamed, <S%H954><s%> <S%H1322><s%> that trust <S%H982><s%> in graven images, <S%H6459><s%> that say <S%H559><s%> to the molten images, <S%H4541><s%> Ye <S%H859><s%> are our gods. <S%H430><s%>
Hear, <S%H8085><s%> ye deaf; <S%H2795><s%> and look, <S%H5027><s%> ye blind, <S%H5787><s%> that ye may see. <S%H7200><s%>

Who <S%H4310><s%> is blind, <S%H5787><s%> but <S%H3588><s%> <S%H518><s%> my servant? <S%H5650><s%> or deaf, <S%H2795><s%> as my messenger <S%H4397><s%> that I sent? <S%H7971><s%> who <S%H4310><s%> is blind <S%H5787><s%> as he that is perfect, <S%H7999><s%> and blind <S%H5787><s%> as the LORD's <S%H3068><s%> servant? <S%H5650><s%>
Seeing <S%H7200><s%> many things, <S%H7227><s%> but thou observest <S%H8104><s%> not; <S%H3808><s%> opening <S%H6491><s%> the ears, <S%H241><s%> but he heareth <S%H8085><s%> not. <S%H3808><s%>
The LORD <S%H3068><s%> is well pleased <S%H2654><s%> for his righteousness' sake; <S%H4616><s%> <S%H6664><s%> he will magnify <S%H1431><s%> the law, <S%H8451><s%> and make it honorable. <S%H142><s%>

But this <S%H1931><s%> is a people <S%H5971><s%> robbed <S%H962><s%> and spoiled; <S%H8154><s%> they are all <S%H3605><s%> of them snared <S%H6351><s%> in holes, <S%H2352><s%> and they are hid <S%H2244><s%> in prison <S%H3608><s%> houses: <S%H1004><s%> they are <S%H1961><s%> for a prey, <S%H957><s%> and none <S%H369><s%> delivereth; <S%H5337><s%> for a spoil, <S%H4933><s%> and none <S%H369><s%> saith, <S%H559><s%> Restore. <S%H7725><s%>
Who <S%H4310><s%> among you will give ear <S%H238><s%> to this? <S%H2063><s%> who will hearken <S%H7181><s%> and hear <S%H8085><s%> for the time to come? <S%H268><s%>

Who <S%H4310><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> Jacob <S%H3290><s%> for a spoil, <S%H4933><s%> and Israel <S%H3478><s%> to the robbers? <S%H962><s%> did not <S%H3808><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> he against whom <S%H2098><s%> we have sinned? <S%H2398><s%> for they would <S%H14><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> walk <S%H1980><s%> in his ways, <S%H1870><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> were they obedient <S%H8085><s%> unto his law. <S%H8451><s%>

Therefore he hath poured <S%H8210><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> him the fury <S%H2534><s%> of his anger, <S%H639><s%> and the strength <S%H5807><s%> of battle: <S%H4421><s%> and it hath set him on fire <S%H3857><s%> round about, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5439><s%> yet he knew <S%H3045><s%> not; <S%H3808><s%> and it burned <S%H1197><s%> him, yet he laid <S%H7760><s%> it not <S%H3808><s%> to <S%H5921><s%> heart. <S%H3820><s%>
